A BIT ABOUT ME

I'm a ruby on rails developer living in Paradise with over 12 years of experience working on web development. Currently employed by LessEverything, where I build awesome software for multiple clients and work on amazing products like LessAccounting. I also do some consulting on my free time, so if you have anything interesting contact me.

SO WHAT I WANT TO ACCOMPLISH WITH THIS SITE, YOU ASK?

I've learned so much over this few years, it is time to give something back! Checkout the blog

WHAT I CAN DO

I'm proficient in Ruby and Ruby on Rails, javascript, css and html the whole web stack, well except for design but I know to use a couple of tools like pixelmator and photoshop. Contact me if you need help with any of your web projects!
